valid: For the period 00:00 (UTC) on Mon 1 Dec 2025 to 00:00 (UTC) on Tue 2 Dec 2025
general_synopsis: Atlantic low 958 moving steadily east expected 150 miles west of Rockall 965 by 1800 Monday. New low expected Forties 983 by same time. Low Fisher 990 moving steadily away northeast
